data.actual_result: It should the desktop screen before showing the Android/iOS screen.
data.expected_result: It shows the Android/iOS screen from the start.
data.short_description: [Website bug, Mobile only] https(colon)//discordapp(dot)com/download flashes the desktop screen before showing the Android/iOS screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open https(colon)//discordapp(dot)com/download - Scroll a bit down.
